text: Hello. Would you like to donate to a children's charity called Save the Children today?
How much of my donation would go directly to the children and not the foundation?
All of it will go to the charity. You can donate $0 to $2.
Will my donation just help children in my country or will it be sent to other countries?
It is used to help children internationally. So it will help children in your country and in other countries.
What kind of children are supported by your organization?
Mostly children in developing countries.
Is there any way i could specify that i want my donation to be used to help children in my country?
Your donation will help ensure children's rights to health, education, and safety. However, I do not believe you will be able to specify which country your donation will go to.
If i donate do i get one of those "story of the child your helping" stories?
Hmm. I am not too sure about that one, but you donation will indeed create a tangible impact for the world
I wouldn't mind donating $1 to help the children, i really need the money, but they do too.
That is great. Thank you for your donation. Every little bit helps. I am sure the children will be grateful to receive anything at all.
How do i go about sending the donation?
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children
Sounds good, do you know if i can use this donation as a tax write off?
Probably so. But I am not too sure. You definitely want to ask your tax preparer when you file your taxes.
Alright, i think you have answered all my questions, thank you.
Thank you again. Have a nice day.
You too, goodbye.
